name: The Dravidian Voyager
summary: Journey through the heart of Tamil Nadu, exploring ancient, towering temples and vibrant French-colonial towns.
description:
A 9-day tour through the heart of Tamil Nadu, exploring ancient, towering temples with intricate carvings, a vibrant French-colonial town, and sun-drenched coastal shores.
Day 1: Arrive in Chennai, travel to Mahabalipuram, visit Shore Temple
Day 2: Explore Five Rathas & Arjuna's Penance
Day 3: Travel to Puducherry and explore the French Quarter
Day 4: Visit Auroville and relax on Paradise Beach
Day 5: Travel to Thanjavur, visit Brihadeeswarar Temple
Day 6: Explore Thanjavur Maratha Palace and Art Gallery
Day 7: Travel to Madurai, witness the evening temple ceremony
Day 8: Full tour of the grand Meenakshi Amman Temple complex
Day 9: Explore old Madurai, depart.

name: The Emerald Drifter
summary: Glide through serene backwaters, wander through spice plantations, and unwind on palm-fringed clifftop beaches.
description:
A 7-day tour to glide through serene backwaters on a traditional houseboat, wander through fragrant spice plantations, and unwind on palm-fringed clifftop beaches in 'God's Own Country'.
Day 1: Arrive in Kochi, explore historic Fort Kochi
Day 2: Visit Mattancherry Palace and Chinese Fishing Nets
Day 3: Scenic drive to Munnar, visit a tea plantation
Day 4: Trek in Eravikulam National Park
Day 5: Travel to Alleppey, board an overnight houseboat
Day 6: Disembark, travel to Varkala for sunset
Day 7: Relax on Varkala beach and depart.

name: The Coastal Karma Quest
summary: Discover Karnataka's hidden coastal gems, from sacred temple towns to laid-back bohemian beaches.
description:
A 6-day quest to discover Karnataka's hidden coastal gems, from sacred temple towns with divine feasts to laid-back beaches famed for their bohemian vibe and breathtaking sunsets.
Day 1: Arrive Mangalore, travel to Udupi, visit Sri Krishna Temple
Day 2: Travel to Murudeshwar, marvel at cliffside Shiva statue
Day 3: Journey to Gokarna, relax on Kudle Beach
Day 4: Hike from Om Beach to Half Moon Beach
Day 5: Enjoy a coracle boat ride and explore the town
Day 6: Final beach sunrise before departure.

name: The Coral Reef Explorer
summary: Escape to a tropical paradise, diving in turquoise waters and relaxing on Asia's most beautiful beaches.
description:
An 8-day escape to a tropical paradise. Snorkel and scuba dive in crystal-clear turquoise waters, witness magical bioluminescence, and relax on some of Asia's most beautiful beaches.
Day 1: Arrive in Port Blair, visit Cellular Jail
Day 2: Explore Corbyn's Cove Beach and Chidiya Tapu
Day 3: Ferry to Havelock Island, relax on Radhanagar Beach
Day 4: Scuba diving adventure at Elephant Beach
Day 5: Kayaking through mangroves
Day 6: Ferry to Neil Island, visit Natural Bridge
Day 7: Relax at Bharatpur and Laxmanpur beaches
Day 8: Ferry back to Port Blair for departure.

name: The Ruin Explorer
summary: Wander through the boulder-strewn landscape and mythical ruins of the Vijayanagara Kingdom in Hampi.
description:
A 4-day tour to wander through the boulder-strewn landscape of a fallen empire. Explore ancient temples, royal enclosures, and the mythical ruins of the Vijayanagara Kingdom in Hampi.
Day 1: Overnight train from Bengaluru to Hospet
Day 2: Arrive, explore the Sacred Centre and Virupaksha Temple
Day 3: Discover the Royal Centre and the iconic Stone Chariot
Day 4: Sunrise trek up Matanga Hill before traveling back.

name: The Southern Tip Pilgrim
summary: A spiritual journey to the very end of India, witnessing the confluence of three oceans and majestic temples.
description:
A 5-day spiritual and scenic journey to the very end of India. Witness the confluence of three oceans, majestic temples, and a spectacular sunrise that is second to none.
Day 1: Arrive in Trivandrum, transfer to Kovalam beach
Day 2: Free day for swimming or ayurvedic massage
Day 3: Travel to Kanyakumari, watch the sunset
Day 4: Witness the sunrise, take a ferry to Vivekananda Rock
Day 5: Travel back to Trivandrum, visit Padmanabhaswamy Temple, then depart.

name: The Royal Voyager
summary: Step back in time to the era of Maharajas, exploring majestic forts, opulent palaces, and vibrant desert markets.
description:
A 10-day tour to step back in time to the era of Maharajas. Explore majestic forts, opulent palaces, and vibrant desert markets in the heart of North India.
Day 1: Arrive Jaipur, visit the City Palace
Day 2-3: Explore Amer Fort, Jal Mahal and Hawa Mahal
Day 4-5: Travel to Jodhpur, visit Mehrangarh Fort
Day 6-7: Travel to Jaisalmer, enjoy a desert safari and tour the living fort
Day 8: Long travel day to Udaipur
Day 9: Explore the City Palace and take a boat ride on Lake Pichola
Day 10: Visit Saheliyon Ki Bari and depart from Udaipur.

name: The Himalayan Mystic
summary: Find inner peace amidst the soaring Himalayas with yoga, meditation, and rafting on the sacred Ganges.
description:
A 5-day spiritual journey of yoga, meditation, and thrilling white-water rafting on the sacred Ganges river.
Day 1: Travel from Delhi to Haridwar
Day 2: Witness Ganga Aarti in Haridwar, then travel to Rishikesh
Day 3: Morning yoga session followed by white-water rafting
Day 4: Visit the Beatles Ashram and Laxman Jhula bridge
Day 5: Journey back to Delhi.

name: The Coffee & Coorg Adventurer
summary: Breathe in the aromatic air of Coorg, the 'Scotland of India,' exploring lush coffee plantations and waterfalls.
description:
A 4-day tour to breathe in the aromatic air of Coorg, the 'Scotland of India.' Stay in lush coffee plantations, trek to cascading waterfalls, and explore the serene Tibetan settlement of Bylakuppe.
Day 1: Drive from Bengaluru to Coorg, visit Abbey Falls
Day 2: Guided tour of a coffee plantation, sunset from Raja's Seat
Day 3: Visit Dubare Elephant Camp and the Tibetan Golden Temple
Day 4: Return drive to Bengaluru.

name: The Sun Seeker
summary: From vibrant beach parties in the north to serene sunsets in the south, experience the best of Goa.
description:
A 5-day tour to experience the best of Goa. Relish Portuguese heritage, delicious seafood, and the laid-back Susegad lifestyle.
Day 1: Arrive and check into your hotel in North Goa
Day 2: Explore Anjuna Flea Market and Baga Beach nightlife
Day 3: Tour UNESCO churches in Old Goa, then travel south
Day 4: Relax on the beautiful Palolem Beach
Day 5: Visit Agonda Beach before departing.
